item.title: Link Failure (Equinix Fabric, Metro Connect)
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Failure on dark fiber link on SP Metro

Summary: Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits experienced service interruption, while Protected Metro Connect circuits experienced a 50ms switching hit. [Medium] - Failure on dark fiber link on SP Metro

Summary: Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits experienced service interruption, while Protected Metro Connect circuits experienced a 50ms switching hit. Equinix engineers are investigating the issue. [Medium] - Identified - We are currently investigating this issue.

Summary: Equinix engineers are investigating the issue with the dark fiber link on SP Metro.

Feb 23, 14:55 UTC
Resolved - Failure on dark fiber link on SP Metro.

Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits experienced service interruption, while Protected Metro Connect circuits experienced a 50ms switching hit. Equinix engineers are investigating the issue..

item.title: Provider Issue (Equinix Fabric)
item.content:encoded:
Feb 23, 10:22 UTC
Update - Current Service Impact: Reduced redundancy.
Latest Update: One of Equinix backbone circuits between EMEA and APAC regions went down. Your traffic was re-routed to alternate paths. Due to the re-routing you might experience a change in latency.
Next Action: The issue will be verified with the circuit provider..

048svtr71hf6

Incident Number: INC0029730
[Equinix Fabric - EMEA (GV) & Asia-Pacific (SG)]

Feb 23, 10:06 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating this issue.

048svtr71hf6

Incident Number: INC0029730
[Equinix Fabric - EMEA (GV) & Asia-Pacific (SG)]

item.title: Provider Issue (Equinix Fabric)
item.content:encoded:
Feb 23, 08:23 UTC
Resolved - Equinix Fabric backbone provider (Vocus) has identified the fault location and still working on restoration plan. There is no ETR available at the moment.

Next Action: Equinix SMC will closely follow up with provider on the process of restoration..

426qrj3jqcc4

Incident Number: INC0025564
[Equinix Fabric - Asia-Pacific (PE, SG)]

Jan 20, 03:33 UTC
Update - Equinix Fabric backbone provider (Vocus) has identified the fault location and still working on restoration plan. There is no ETR available at the moment.

Next Action: Equinix SMC will closely follow up with provider on the process of restoration..

426qrj3jqcc4

Incident Number: INC0025564
[Equinix Fabric - Asia-Pacific (PE, SG)]

Jan 12, 04:59 UTC
Update - Vocus has identified a fault condition on the Australia Singapore Cable System impacting all services. Carrier has narrowed down fault in the cable system to the North of the Anyer branching unit in Indonesian waters. Engineers are now working with Marine repair vessel to establish a repair plan. No ETR has been provided..

426qrj3jqcc4

Incident Number: INC0025564
[Equinix Fabric - Asia-Pacific (PE, SG)]

Jan 11, 11:35 UTC
Update - SMC Engineer has identified backbone link failure between SG and PE Metros. Issue was reported to Provider for furhter investigation..

item.title: Network Service Issue (Equinix Fabric)
item.content:encoded:
Feb 23, 07:20 UTC
Update - Equinix SMC detected a line card rebooted in one of the primary Equinix Fabric (EF) devices.

Equinix Fabric customers without port and VC redundancy experienced service interruption while no impact to customers with redundancy. Equinix engineers are investigating the issue. .
